INSERT INTO han_new_data_my(task_id,keyword,content_id,title,content, province, city, country, url, baiLian_budget, baiLian_amount_unit,xmNumber, bidding_type, progid, zhao_biao_unit, relation_name, relation_way, agent_unit, agent_relation_ame, agent_relation_way, zhong_biao_unit, link_man, link_phone,registration_begin_time, registration_end_time, biding_acquire_time, biding_end_time, tender_begin_time, tender_end_time,update_time,type, bidder,notice_types,open_biding_time,is_electronic,code,isfile,keyword_term,keywords, infoTypeSegment) VALUES
( #{item.task_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.content_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.baiLian_budget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.baiLian_amount_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xmNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bidding_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.progid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zhao_biao_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relation_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relation_way,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.agent_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.agent_relation_ame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.agent_relation_way,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zhong_biao_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.link_man,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.link_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.registration_begin_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.registration_end_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.biding_acquire_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.biding_end_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tender_begin_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tender_end_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bidder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.notice_types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.open_biding_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.is_electronic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.keyword_term,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.infoTypeSegment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
